name: The Second Self Program
description:
After a robot uprising, you've been assigned to an elite task force dedicated to wiping out remaining threats. To complete your mission, you'll have to make repeated excursions into a well-protected underground bunker, slowly making progress towards its bottom levels and unraveling the mystery hidden there. Along the way, you'll find a wide variety of weapons and special abilities that allow you to more effectively defeat your enemies.

Hope you enjoy!
